item.description:
Friday, April 15, 2011 at 8:30 PM

Christina's Grille - Rt 1 Foxboro, MA 1 Social Networkers going Dennis Serpone is hosting this Meetup

Price: $13.00 per person

FRIDAY, APRIL 15, CHRISTINA’S GRAND BALLROOM, 2 Washington St., Rte.1 northbound, Foxboro. (508)668-7200. Featuring “MEN IN BLACK” 8:30-12:00 AM. Complimentary buffet all night, free door prizes, raffle, and MATCH GAME prizes. www.se-4u.com. FREE DANCE LESSONS with Jim, 7:30-8:30 pm. read more THIS IS POSTED WITH SINGLES WITH STYLE MEETUP I BELIEVE "MEN IN BLACK" IS A BAND I AM POSTING THIS BUT NOT BE AVAILABLE TO ATTEND BECAUSE I AM ON CALL FOR O.R THIS WEEKEND BUT IF ANY OF YOU WANT TO GO I WANTED TO POST IT. AGAIN I MIGHT BE THERE BUT NOT PROMISE. I HAVE BEEN TO THESE AND IT IS ALOT OF FUN. LESSONS ARE GIVEN BUT THE DANCE IS FREE STYLE NO NEED TO GO TO LESSONS REALLY. IT IS NOT SWING OR BALLROOM. HOPE SOME OF YOU WILL GO EVEN IF I CANNOT ATTEND.
item.how_to_find_us: WELL LOOK FOR MEMBERS YOU MIGHT KNOW WHO WILL BE THERE/ OR MEETUP SIGN.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: SINGLES WITH STYLE
